ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Title: Choices
ComicInfo.Summary: Choices: John Blaze is anxious to put the supernatural things behind him but Clara tells him that there are still greater threats to come. John decides he still has to leave the Ghost Rider behind and leaves to see Dan Ketch who has just got out of the hospital. Meanwhile, Hag and Troll decide to take Deathwatch's body back home, unfortunately, they eventually cross paths with John and the Ghost Rider. After a fight Hag and Troll escape and John agrees to help Ghost Rider pursue them to help save some humans they have trapped.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:45:39. [Issue ID 85596]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Jane (death),Deathwatch's body,Johnny Blaze,Clara,Venom (cameo),Eli,Edward (death),Ghost Rider [Daniel Ketch],Wolf,Dan Ketch,Troll,Hag
ComicInfo.Inker: Arthur Adams,Joe Kubert,Tom Mandrake,Arthur Adams,Joe Kubert,Tom Mandrake
